title: FF! Doc | NumberParam
paragraphs: This component has no required attributes
listItems: {uid}: an unique identifier, based on the IP address and java.rmi.server.UID
{uuid}: an unique identifier, based on the IP address and java.util.UUID
{hostname}: the name of the machine the application runs on
{username}: username from the credentials found using authAlias, or the username attribute
{password}: password from the credentials found using authAlias, or the password attribute
{principal}: Name of the current principal, similar to the org.frankframework.pipes.GetPrincipalPipe.

Attributes

This component has no required attributes

Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
decimalSeparator	text	system default
Separate the integer part from the fractional part of a number.
groupingSeparator	text	system default
In the United States, the comma is typically used for the grouping separator; however, several publication standards follow international standards in using either a space or a thin space character.
maxInclusive	text	-
Used in combination with type number; if set and the value of the parameter exceeds this maximum value, this maximum value is taken
minInclusive	text	-
